contents.text: Thank you for calling Motionloft in San Francisco, your partner for people and vehicle analytics.
For sales and new solutions, press 1.
To schedule a demo of our analytics platform, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative for a platform demo.

navigationGoals: Schedule a demo of the analytics platform this week
I need to schedule a demo of the analytics platform to see how it can support my veteran housing project.
I want to schedule a hands-on demo of the Motionloft analytics dashboard and API.
I’d like to schedule a demonstration of your analytics platform so I can see how it works.
I’d like to arrange a hands-on demonstration of your analytics platform.

contents.text: To speak with a sales agent about pricing and packages, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our pricing and packages team.

navigationGoals: Get details on pricing tiers and package options
I want to discuss pricing and package options for monitoring traffic around our community center.
I need to review and discuss enterprise subscription tiers and pricing options.
I need to talk about pricing and package options for your analytics service.
I need detailed information on pricing tiers and package options for your analytics services.

contents.text: For support and account services, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a technical issue with my analytics dashboard
I'm having trouble feeding sensor data into the platform and need technical troubleshooting.
I require technical support troubleshooting API data ingestion and sensor connectivity.
I’m having trouble using my account dashboard and need technical help.
I’m experiencing an issue with my analytics data feed and need technical support.

contents.text: For billing and account management, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our billing and account management team.

navigationGoals: Update billing info and review recent account charges
I need help reviewing my latest invoice and applying any available veteran discount.
I want to update my billing information and review my invoice history.
I need help understanding my bill and updating my account details.
I have questions about my latest invoice and need assistance with billing and account management.
